lead_paragraph: There were no crowds, just dock workers, a handful of high officials and the Stars and Stripes fluttering from two flagpoles. A grimy stevedore shouted "Hurray!" as a gray salt-crusted transport nosed through the mist and tied up at a pier in Northern Ireland.
abstract: ed on U S pub attitude toward USSR campaign
